name: arsd-official
description: Subpackage collection for web, database, terminal ui, gui, scripting, and more with a commitment to long-term compatibility and stability. Use individual subpackages instead of the overall package to avoid bringing in things you don't need/want!

subPackages.name: simpledisplay
subPackages.description: Window creation and basic drawing

subPackages.name: minigui
subPackages.description: Small GUI widget library for Windows and Linux

subPackages.name: nanovega
subPackages.description: Vector graphics library

subPackages.name: minigui-nanovega
subPackages.description: Nanovega widget add-on for minigui. New in v9.2.

subPackages.name: gamehelpers
subPackages.description: Assorted game-related structs and algorithms

subPackages.name: joystick
subPackages.description: joystick reading for Windows XInput and Linux

subPackages.name: fibersocket
subPackages.description: Phobos-based fiber socket async i/o subclass

subPackages.name: email
subPackages.description: Email helper library, both sending MIME messages and parsing incoming mbox/maildir messages

subPackages.name: mailserver
subPackages.description: Bare-bones incoming-only smtp server

subPackages.name: image_files
subPackages.description: Various image file format support - PNG read/write, JPEG, TGA, BMP, PCX, TGA, DDS read.

subPackages.name: imageresize
subPackages.description: Image resizer for color.d's MemoryImage

subPackages.name: simpleaudio
subPackages.description: Simple audio+midi playback and capture for Windows and Linux

subPackages.name: midi
subPackages.description: midi file format classes

subPackages.name: nukedopl3
subPackages.description: nukedopl3 emulator port, required by simpleaudio's playEmulatedOpl3Midi functio

subPackages.name: mp3
subPackages.description: MP3 decoder. Required if you use simpleaudio's playMp3 function

subPackages.name: vorbis
subPackages.description: Ogg vorbis decoder. Required if you use simpleaudio's playOgg function

subPackages.name: wav
subPackages.description: wav file format read and write

subPackages.name: svg
subPackages.description: Dependency-free partial SVG file format read support

subPackages.name: jpeg
subPackages.description: Dependency-free partial JPEG file format read and write support

subPackages.name: png
subPackages.description: PNG file format support

subPackages.name: bmp
subPackages.description: BMP file format support

subPackages.name: htmltotext
subPackages.description: HTML to plain text conversion

subPackages.name: dom
subPackages.description: HTML tag soup DOM library

subPackages.name: rss
subPackages.description: RSS/Atom parsing

subPackages.name: characterencodings
subPackages.description: Character encodings to UTF-8

subPackages.name: argon2
subPackages.description: Binding to the argon2 password hashing C library

subPackages.name: cgi
subPackages.description: web server library with cgi, fastcgi, scgi, and embedded http server support

subPackages.name: mysql
subPackages.description: MySQL client library. Wraps the official C library with my database.d interface.

subPackages.name: postgres
subPackages.description: Postgresql client library. Wraps the libpq C library with my database.d interface.

subPackages.name: sqlite
subPackages.description: sqlite wrapper. Wraps the official C library with my database.d interface.

subPackages.name: mssql
subPackages.description: Microsoft SQL Server client library. Wraps the official ODBC library with my database.d interface.

subPackages.name: http
subPackages.description: HTTP client library. Depends on OpenSSL right now on all platforms. On 32 bit Windows, you may need to get OMF openssl lib and dlls (ask me if you can't find it)

subPackages.name: jsvar
subPackages.description: Javascript-like object in D, capable of json read/write/manipulation.

subPackages.name: jni
subPackages.description: Provides easy interop with Java via JNI.

subPackages.name: script
subPackages.description: Small Javascript-like script interpreter with easy D API

subPackages.name: terminal
subPackages.description: Cross-platform Terminal I/O with color, mouse support, real time input, etc.

subPackages.name: terminalemulator
subPackages.description: A terminal emulation core as an in-memory library. Also includes mixin templates to assist with creating UIs, etc.

subPackages.name: ttf
subPackages.description: port of stb_ttf to D

subPackages.name: color_base
subPackages.description: Base color, point, image interface definitions

subPackages.name: database_base
subPackages.description: Basic database interface definitions. Use one (or more) of the drivers like arsd-official:mysql or arsd-official:postgres instead

subPackages.name: libssh2_bindings
subPackages.description: My bindings to libssh2

subPackages.name: eventloop
subPackages.description: My DEPRECATED event loop. Do NOT use in new programs, only offered here because I use it in a lot of old programs.

subPackages.name: archive
subPackages.description: Archive file support - tar, tar.xz decoders, and custom format "arcz" encoding and decoding. Self-contained.
